thread.title: Omron Introduces NJ101 Sysmac Controller

title: Omron Introduces NJ101 Sysmac Controller
text:
Omron Introduces NJ101 Sysmac Controller Omron Introduces NJ101 Sysmac Controller September 26 2015 GO TO SUPPLIER'S WEBSITE 
September 26, 2015 - Omron Introduces NJ101 Sysmac Controller with EtherCAT and EtherNet/IP communications. 
Sysmac Studio software is used to develop and maintain all aspects of the control system, including controller logic, HMI development, safety programming, vision programming, smart sensing, and full network configuration for EtherCAT and EtherNet/IP. Data are maintained in a single file with audit tracking to eliminate multiple files of various revision levels. 
The NJ101 is compatible with Omronâ€™s NJ501/301 and NX701 products, with a similar size and functionality. The NJ101 is ideal for lower-risk applications where operators need to coordinate only up to 2 axes of motion, but still utilize Sysmac capabilities (i.e. graphical CAM editor, 3-D simulation, EtherCAT distributed clock, parameter backup to the controller for easy servo amplifier replacement, etc.). 
Key benefits of the NJ101: Lowest cost point controller within Sysmac family Uses same integrated development environment Project scales to higher levels of controller (NJ3/NJ5/NX7) Backwards compatible with Omron CJ2 PLC I/O and communication modules 
Ideal applications for the NJ101 include: Modular Specialty Machinery, Rotary Knife Applications, Low-Axis High-Performance Motion, Packaging, Food & Beverage, Multi-Loop Process Control, Petro/Chemical, Pharmaceutical, Automotive and Material Handling Equipment.
